What book is The movie Accomplice based on?

The movieAccomplice is based on the bookSimon Lashwritten by  Frank Gruber

Simon Lash(Private Detective)Published by Ulverscroft - 1/1/1995

Private detective Simon Lash was far more concerned with his library of rare Americana than the prospect of gaining clients, but when Joyce Bonniwell arrived one morning in a state of extreme agitation, there wasn't much Lash could do; after all, ten years ago he and Joyce.....Her husband had disappeared. "An attack of amnesia,"She said. But it wasn't, for out of the mountains came the news of the discovery of Jim's body ; he was dead - murdered - and he wasn't the first to die.

Related books / From the author(s)

Simon Lash

written byFrank Gruber

Published by Ulverscroft - 1/1/1995

Private detective Simon Lash was far more concerned with his library of rare Americana than the prospect of gaining clients, but when Joyce Bonniwell arrived one morning in a state of extreme agitation, there wasn't much Lash could do; after all, ten years ago he and Joyce.....Her husband had disappeared. "An attack of amnesia,"She said. But it wasn't, for out of the mountains came the news of the discovery of Jim's body ; he was dead - murdered - and he wasn't the first to die.

The Buffalo Box

written byFrank Gruber

1/1/1942

The Leather Duke

written byFrank Gruber

Published by Ulverscroft Large Print Books - 1/1/1996

The Silver Tombstone

written byFrank Gruber

Published by Ulverscroft Large Print Books - 1/1/1945

When Johnny Fletcher and Sam Cragg's jalopy runs out of petrol, a Samaritan by the name of Joe Cotter pushes them to a motel and demands twenty dollars. Early the next morning, they siphon petrol from Cotter's convertible and make a hasty exit. However, they quickly dump their car when they discover a dead body sprawled in the back seat. They hitch a lift to Los Angeles, where a silver nugget comes hurtling through their hotel window. Is there a connection between this and the dead body?

Beagle Scented Murder

written byFrank Gruber

1/1/1946

Did you know that the movie Accomplice is based on the book Simon Lash?

Private detective Simon Lash and his assistant Eddie Slocum are hired by Joyce Bonniwell to find her missing husband Jim Bonniwell. They learn from Mr. Springer, president of the bank where Bonniwell worked, that a woman named Evelyn Price is mixed up in the case. Following up on a call from Sheriff Rucker, Joyce and Simon go to Palmdale and Joyce identifies the body of a murdered man as her husband. Simon, following up the lead of the mysterious woman, goes to Mesa, New Mexico and finds the mystery woman to be Joyce and her husband very much alive.

  • Internet Movie Database:  5.2/10
